files.patch:
@@ -156,4 +156,3 @@

-                  .fullname("setup-pre-push-hooks")

@@ -385,1 +384,1 @@

@@ -387,1 +386,1 @@
-                    var res = GitJCheck.run(repo, new String[]{"--setup-pre-push-hooks", setupPrePushHooksOption });
+                    var res = GitJCheck.run(repo, new String[]{"--setup-pre-push-hook", setupPrePushHooksOption });
